items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: Lightweight, extensible logging library with Clean Architecture. Supports console, file, and custom transports with modular formatting. Perfect for vanilla JS and Node.js applications.

items.content_html: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.
items.title: imabhi7/Local-Certificate-Authority-Service: Open-source web app for managing CSRs and issuing X.509 certificates in a small PKI. Built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL, it offers user/admin dashboards, secure authentication, and email notifications. Perfect for lightweight PKI setups.

items.content_html: A lightweight, secure key vault built with React. Stores encrypted key-label pairs locally, with IP-based access control and auto-lock after inactivity. Perfect for personal key management.
items.title: quddusyo/key-secure-manage: A lightweight, secure key vault built with React. Stores encrypted key-label pairs locally, with IP-based access control and auto-lock after inactivity. Perfect for personal key management.

items.content_html: Recastra is a lightweight TypeScript plugin that uses WebRTC to record audio and video from the user's device directly in the browser. Designed for ease of integration and modern browser compatibility.

items.content_html: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
items.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.
